com.herocraftonline.heroes.characters.effects

Interface Periodic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CombatEffect, CombustEffect, HPlayerListener.BedHealEffect, PeriodicDamageEffect, PeriodicEffect, PeriodicExpirableEffect, PeriodicHealEffect, SkillAssassinsBlade.AssassinsPoison, SkillBleed.BleedSkillEffect, SkillConfuse.ConfuseEffect, SkillLight.LightEffect, SkillPoison.PoisonSkillEffect, SkillPoisonArrow.ArrowPoison, SneakEffect, SoundEffect, StunEffect, SummonEffect.FollowEffect

    public interface Periodic

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getLastTickTime()
      Returns the last time the effect ticked
      long getPeriod() 
      boolean isReady()
      Returns whether the effect is ready for ticking
      void tick(CharacterTemplate character)
      The general tick method, this should will call tickMonster/tickHero itself
      void tickHero(Hero hero)
      runs the effect on the specified hero
      void tickMonster(Monster monster)
      runs the effect on the specified creature
